name: Bharatanatyam
description: Ever thought of connecting mythology with fun? Prerna school of finearts provides you with packed Bharatanatyam classes on saturdays and sundays. have fun with the feeling of divinity!

name: Western
description: Make your kids feel energetic by enrolling them in our Western dance classes on wedesdays and thursdays! Our experienced instructors are very dedicated and will help your kids gain experience and confidence

name: Ballet
description: Balley is the epitome of grace and perfections. We encourage our students to be confident and present their best. classes are held on mondays and fridays

name: Tapdance
description: Get in sync with the beats of life by enrolling youself into our weekly  once balley lesson by exteremely trained and experienced professionals

name: Light Music
description: Well trained professionals train the voices of students to be melodious and tuned! if your field of interest is music this is the right place for you

name: Rabindra Sangeet
description: Beautiful tunes of Rabindranath Tagore revives the soul and gives meaning to life! be one of the few people who get the opportunity to learn the art form

name: Piano
description: Learn the melodious instrument Piano in a very professional manner and get a chance to be the pianist in our school band! classes are taken on wednesday and saturday

name: Drums
description: Explore the rockstar  side of yourseld and take our drum lessons regularly. our team of professionals ar ehere to guide you and leadyou to a path of success !
